text: Giacomo Simoncini (born 30 November 1994) is a Sammarinese sports executive and politician. He was one of the Captains Regent of San Marino with Francesco Mussoni from 2021 to 2022. He was the youngest state leader in the world, and also is the only head of state under 30 years of age as of 2021. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Captains Regent of San Marino
title: Giacomo Simoncini
